findings.title: Deployer cannot mint any new tokens
findings.description: The deployer does not have the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract doesn’t import npm packages from source (like OpenZeppelin etc.)
findings.description: We recommend to import all packages from npm directly without flatten the contract. Functions could be modified or can be susceptible to vulnerabilities

findings.title: Missing Zero Address Validation (missing-zero-check)
findings.description: Check that the address is not zero

findings.title: State variable visibility is not set
findings.description: The report highlights a total of 60 state variables, with only 34 being public. This implies that 26 state variables do not have their visibility set.
